subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Sarah Estep's tapings with reel to reel?
author: Lisby
full_text:
The ghost boxes work better than anything I've ever used. I have a  
mini and one of Frank's originals and they both are fantastic. After  
that, I had the most success with reel-to-reel. But using the boxes  
with a digital recorder and proper audio software is worlds beyond  
what we used to do in the 1980s.

Ann
